name: Bounty Hunter
description: You start knowing 1 evil player. If the player you know dies, you learn another evil player tonight. [1 Townsfolk is evil]
first_night_desc: Point to 1 evil player. Wake the townsfolk who is evil and show them the 'You are' card and the thumbs down evil sign.
other_night_desc: If the known evil player has died, point to another evil player.
